Spodaj je zaključni izpit za 8 razred (14 letnoki) iz podeželske
šole v Kansasu l. 1895. Dvomim da ga reši 1/4 današnjih
diplomantov...

Grammar (Time, one hour)

1. Give nine rules for the use of Capital Letters.
2. Name the Parts of Speech and define those that have no
modifications.
3. Define Verse, Stanza and Paragraph.
4. What are the Principal Parts of a verb? Give Principal Parts of
do, lie, lay and run.
5. Define Case, Illustrate each Case.
6. What is Punctuation? Give rules for principal marks of
Punctuation.
7-10. Write a composition of about 150 words and show therein that
you understand the practical use of the rules of grammar.

Arithmetic (Time, 1.25 hours)

1. Name and define the Fundamental Rules of Arithmetic.
2. A wagon box is 2 ft. deep, 10 feet long, and 3 ft. wide. How
many bushels of wheat will it hold?
3. If a load of wheat weighs 3942 lbs., what is it worth at 50 cts.
per bu, deducting 1050 lbs. for tare?
4. District No. 33 has a valuation of $35,000. What is the
necessary levy to carry on a school seven months at $50 per month,
and have $104 for incidentals?
5. Find cost of 6720 lbs. coal at $6.00 per ton.
6. Find the interest of $512.60 for 8 months and 18 days at 7
percent.
7. What is the cost of 40 boards 12 inches wide and 16 ft. long at
$.20 per inch?
8. Find bank discount on $300 for 90 days (no grace) at 10
percent.
9. What is the cost of a square farm at $15 per acre, the distance
around which is 640 rods?
10. Write a Bank Check, a Promissory Note, and a Receipt.

U.S. History (Time, 45 minutes)

1. Give the epochs into which U.S. History is divided.
2. Give an account of the discovery of America by Columbus.
3. Relate the causes and results of the Revolutionary War.
4. Show the territorial growth of the United States.
5. Tell what you can of the history of Kansas.
6. Describe three of the most prominent battles of the
Rebellion.
7. Who were the following: Morse, Whitney, Fulton, Bell, Lincoln,
Penn, and Howe?
8. Name events connected with the following dates: 1607, 1620,
1800, 1849, and 1865?

Orthography (Time, one hour)

1. What is meant by the following: Alphabet, phonetic orthography,
etymology, syllabication?
2. What are elementary sounds? How classified?
3. What are the following, and give examples of each: Trigraph,
subvocals, diphthong, cognate letters, linguals?
4. Give four substitutes for caret 'u'.
5. Give two rules for spelling words with final 'e'. Name two
exceptions under each rule.
6. Give two uses of silent letters in spelling. Illustrate
each.
7. Define the following prefixes and use in connection with a word:
Bi, dis, mis, pre, semi, post, non, inter, mono, super.
8. Mark diacritically and divide into syllables the following, and
name the sign that indicates the sound: Card, ball, mercy, sir,
odd, cell, rise, blood, fare, last.
9. Use the following correctly in sentences, Cite, site, sight,
fane, fain, feign, vane, vain, vein, raze, raise, rays.
10. Write 10 words frequently mispronounced and indicate
pronunciation by use of diacritical marks and by
syllabication.

Geography (Time, one hour)

1. What is climate? Upon what does climate depend?
2. How do you account for the extremes of climate in Kansas?
3. Of what use are rivers? Of what use is the ocean?
4. Describe the mountains of N.A.
5. Name and describe the following: Monrovia, Odessa, Denver,
Manitoba, Hecla, Yukon, St. Helena, Juan Fernandez, Aspinwall and
Orinoco.
6. Name and locate the principal trade centers of the U.S.
7. Name all the republics of Europe and give capital of each.
8. Why is the Atlantic Coast colder than the Pacific in the same
latitude?
9. Describe the process by which the water of the ocean returns to
the sources of rivers.
10. Describe the movements of the earth. Give inclination of the
earth.

ctx: Lov na kadre: ste pripravljeni na generacijo Z?
content:
Pri vsej tej gonji za kadre je treba povedati, kaj vendar naročniki
ponujajo. Pogosto se mladim v generaciji Z ponuja minimalca (razen
v nekaterih primerih, ko trg narekuje res čisto druge plače -
farmacija, IT, medicina,..) in ko pridejo iz faksa bi zaposlovalci
radi da imajo že 5 let izkušenj.
Skratka, s kadri je res izziv, je pa res, da večina podjetij ne
naredi skoraj nič na temu, da bi interno kaj spremenili, samo
jamrajo kako ni kadra, plačali pa bi jih najmanj kot lahko.
Ponudite 20% več pa se bo hitro našel kader, pa okolje v katerem
lahko pove svoje mnenje, kjer se lahko razvija in raste.
author: PETROL09

ctx: Lov na kadre: ste pripravljeni na generacijo Z?
content:
[FIN-454644]
Vazno je, da sefi ubogajo, opravijo delo in z globokim priklonom
prosijo, da mladi ambicioznezi vzamejo denar.Dejte ga srat.
Piramido postavite na spico. Ni treba cakati, da se prevrne.
Zbezite, da se ne prevrne na vas. In vas zmecka.
Del tega je res, danes je veliko polnih riti, ki so imeli vse, kar
so želeli in to pričakujejo tudi naprej. Pa precej je takih, ki so
komaj iz faksa in bi že bili neki veliko šefi, čeprav ne znajo
skoraj nič.
Je pa to samo del zgodbe. Še vedno je veliko mladih, ki so
pripravljeni delati, se dokazati, samo težko pridejo do
priložnosti, razen do minimalno plačanega študentskega dela. Del te
slike je tudi to, da se pri nas težko odpušča. Po moje 2/3 tistih v
javni upravi dela zelo malo in bi zamenjava z mladimi bila terna.
Marsikaj bi se spremenilo. Samo naj nekdo omogoči izvedbo tega
scenarija.
author: PETROL09

ctx: Lov na kadre: ste pripravljeni na generacijo Z?
content:
Da se sploh razpravlja o pristopih, kako do rezultata je zgreseno.
Mnogo mladih talentiranih je zagnanih in presegajo znanja
starejsih. Ti bodo zgrabili priloznost in sijajno opravili zadano
nalogo. Ampak kaj s troublemakerji, s katerimi se je treba
ukvarjati toliko, da ne zasluzijo za sol? To kar ti pravis:
odpuscanje. Delovne naloge in tempo geerrira
zaposlovalec/delodajalec/delovodja/sef, v prostem casu pa vse
generacije delajo, kar hocejo in zmorejo. Sluzba je sluzba, druzba
je druzba. Bleferji vseh dezel zdruzite se.

ctx: Lov na kadre: ste pripravljeni na generacijo Z?
content:
Nenehno govorite o delu od doma. Mi lahko razložite, kako bo od
doma delal pek, voznik, prodajalec, zdravnik,... najbrž ste
dojeli.
Seveda lahko uprava 'dela' od doma tisto uro dve efektivnega dela
na dan in si piše ure glede na to, koliko časa je bil on
line.
Tudi marsikdo drug bi lahko delal od dom a potem pozabimo ure!
Danes pa me vsak inšpektor za delo najprej vpraša po evidenci
delovnega časa. Plačilo za opravljeno delo, pa smo zmenjeni.
Najbrž res vsem takim in drugačnim politikom in tem, ki politiko na
tak ali drugačen način krojijo, manjka stika z realnostjo v
panogah, kjer vlada konkurenca. Kjer nisi plačan od natipkane
strani brez vsebine, časa zabitega v pisarni ali od doma na
socijalnih omrežjih,.... Kjer velja samo rezultat, ki je običajno
posledica sposobnosti, dela, iznajdljivosti ali pač pomanjkanja teh
lastnosti.
Bojim se, da bo kmalu nastopil čas za hard reset družbe!
author: 0220Agrok
